channel.title: The Penalty Flag
channel.description: On "The Penalty Flag", Chris and Tony are going to be talking about the week that was, the week that will be, and every controversy on the gridiron. There may be some yelling involved and flags thrown. This isn’t your average sports debate show. The stakes have never been higher.
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Chris Ashe, Tony Smith

item.title: Week 4: The Turning Point
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the QB controversy in Dallas, the close race in the NFC East, and how far can this Lions team go? All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Week 3: The Butt Punt
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the hot starts for the Jaguars and Eagles, the abysmal start to the Raiders season, and which team under .500 we think has the best chance to bounce back. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: Week 2: Welcome Back Football
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the Cowboys season after Dak Prescott’s injury, the Offensive Coordinator situation for the Patriots, and our “way to early” Super Bowl predictions. All this and more, on the Season 2 premiere of The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: Super Bowl LVI
item.description:

item.title: Divisional Round: Greatest. Playoff. Weekend. Ever.
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the greatest playoff weekend in NFL history, the overtime rule controversy, and who will advance to Super Bowl 56. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Wild Card Weekend
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the controversial ending to the 49ers v.s Dallas game, will Aaron Rodgers break his playoff curse, and who will advance to the conference championship. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Week 18: Playoffs?!?!
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the epic collapse of the Colts season, the crazy finish of the regular season, and the first playoff prediction bracket of the 2021 playoffs. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Week 17: The Final Stretch
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony cap off the 2021 regular season with the retaking of the AFC lead by the Titans, Antonio Brown’s departure from the Buccaneers, and Chris and Tony make their playoff predictions of who will take those last Wild Card Spots. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Week 15: MVP MVP MVP
item.description:
This week, Chris discusses the recent failed two point conversion attempts by the Ravens, the incredible Lions upset win against the Cardinals, and Chris dives into his first playoff prediction bracket. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.description:

item.title: Week 4: Brady vs Belichick
item.description: This week, Chris and Tony discuss the future of the Steelers, the success of the Cardinals, and whether or not Brady finally faced his demons in Foxborough. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Introducing The Penalty Flag
item.description: On “The Penalty Flag”, Chris and Tony are going to be talking about the week that was, the week that will be, and every controversy on the gridiron. There may be some yelling involved and flags thrown. This isn’t your average sports debate show. The stakes have never been higher.
